body.infoP: Here you will find various articles, tutorials and information about my projects on topics like web development, software engineering and programming languages.

aboutPage.about_me2: I am Nurbek Rasulov, from Kashkadarya region of Uzbekistan, now I live in Karshi, Kashkadarya region.
aboutPage.about_learnAb: I am from Kashkadarya vil Qamashi district and now I live in Karshi city. So, from 2021, I started studying Full Stack Programming in an IT center.
aboutPage.learn_calendar5: In the following years and until now
aboutPage.me: Welcome to Rasulovdev's blog! This blog was created by Rasulov Nurbek as a personal win to share his thoughts and ideas with the world. Nurbek is an avid developer who loves to write about all things technology, coding, and more.  On this blog you will find weekly articles and tutorials on topics such as web development, software engineering and programming languages.I'm always learning and researching new technologies, so check back often for new content!  We encourage you to leave comments on our posts and engage with other readers. You can like other people's comments and reply to them as well. We believe that a community of learners can help each other grow and improve.
aboutPage.me2: We encourage you to leave comments on our posts and engage with other readers. You can like other people's comments and reply to them as well. We believe that a community of learners can help each other grow and improve.

cookie.set_text: By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts.
cookie.modal_text: Company LogoPrivacy Preference Center When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience.
cookie.modal_text2: Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
